Name: Burst
Description: Can deal heavy damage in short-time

Name: Health Recovery
Description: Can regenerate the HP of team member

Name: Critical
Description: Easier to deal CRIT DMG to enemies

Name: Damage Reduction

Name: Enhance
Description: Can enhance the abilities of your members

Name: Enmity Vortex

Name: Tank

Name: Support
Description: Boosts restoration efficiency and Synergy Energy recovery speed

Name: Ranged Damage
Description: Can deal ranged attacks against enemies

Name: Amplifier
Description: An all-round character that can pull, control, and deal damage to enemies.
